channel.description: Recent content in myself on forkyfork

item.title: Hello world
item.description: Okay so to be completely honest I don’t really have a plan for this site. Is it supposed to be a blog or just something static occupying my domain, I don’t know… I just accidently stumbled upon this thing called hugo that is a tool for generating websites and wanted to give it a go. And here we are now. So far it seems pretty neat, this thing took about 10mins to get up and running.
